textBox.richText: Member of the biometric team from July 1 to -- PhD on trustworthy speaker recognition. Involved in the project UniTS. Hannah Muckenhirn obtained a MSc degree in communication systems from EPFL in 2014. She did her master thesis at IBM Research Zurich in the "Novel Signal Processing Algorithms" team for the Dome project. There, she studied the accuracy of the signal processing chain used in radio interferometry. After obtaining her Master's degree, she worked as a data scientist in the industry, focusing mainly on Natural Language Processing and on smart meter data analytics.
